post.title: SccSwitch
post.content: It’s late, so this will be quick. I installed GDN Workspaces Source Control Plugin for VS.NET and then realized I couldn’t access SourceSafe repositories any more. A little registry spelunking later, I figured out how to switch back and forth between using GDN Workspaces and SourceSafe for source control. In order to minimize time spent in the registry editor, I whipped up a simple tool to display the list of installed source code control providers and allow the user to select whichever provider they want. Enjoy.
